BytesDropCountBlackhole.Name: bytes_drop_count_blackhole
BytesDropCountBlackhole.Help: The number of bytes dropped because they matched a blackhole route

BytesDropCountNoRoute.Name: bytes_drop_count_no_route
BytesDropCountNoRoute.Help: The number of bytes dropped because they did not match a route

BytesIn.Name: bytes_in
BytesIn.Help: The number of bytes received by the transit gateway

BytesOut.Name: bytes_out
BytesOut.Help: The number of bytes sent from the transit gateway

PacketsIn.Name: packets_in
PacketsIn.Help: The number of packets received by the transit gateway

PacketsOut.Name: packets_out
PacketsOut.Help: The number of packets sent by the transit gateway

PacketDropCountBlackhole.Name: packet_drop_count_blackhole
PacketDropCountBlackhole.Help: The number of packets dropped because they matched a blackhole route

PacketDropCountNoRoute.Name: packet_drop_count_no_route
PacketDropCountNoRoute.Help: The number of packets dropped because they did not match a route

PacketDropTTLExpired.Name: packet_drop_ttl_expired
PacketDropTTLExpired.Help: The number of packets dropped because the TTL expired
